name: Upgrade
storyline: You were sent on a mission to scout an alternate Earth, that was until your way back got destroyed. Now you’re left alone in a dystopian world full of mad men obsessed with mutilating themselves until they’ve become killing machines. Explore the laboratories of Neuron District and slaughter your way back home!
summary: Upgrade is an upcoming sci-fi, first-person shooter set in a dystopian, alternate reality in a research facility full of maniacal cyborgs.
